text: Mitriostigma is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. There are five species all native to Southern Africa.Sonké, B., Simo, M., & Dessein, S. (2009). Synopsis of the genus Mitriostigma (Rubiaceae) with a new monocaulous species from south Cameroon. Nordic Journal of Botany, 27(4), 305-312. Species: * Mitriostigma axillare Hochst. * Mitriostigma barteri Hook.f. ex Hiern * Mitriostigma greenwayi Bridson * Mitriostigma monocaule Sonké & Dessein * Mitriostigma usambarense Verdc. == References == Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Mitriostigma
